Text: warning - be careful downloading stuff like this. I got an e-mail from my ISP (internet service provider) warning my they will disconnect my service if I continue to illegally download movies, because my ISP got an e-mail from CBS in America telling them they will take legal action if I continue to do so.
True it's their right to do so, and in my description i had forgot to mention the finale footnote..., if you like this series, when the DVD appears in your country, buy it!
